content: July 11 Private equity firm EQT said on Tuesday it has agreed to acquire U.S. drug development consultancy Certara for $850 million  including debt  from Arsenal Capital Partners  another buyout firm.

content: INC Research Holdings Inc  said on Wednesday it would merge with private equity-owned inVentiv Health Inc  a fellow contract research services provider  in a $4.6 billion all-stock deal to help it win contracts with large pharma companies.
name: INC Research Holdings Inc
title: INC Research to merge with inVentiv in latest contract medical research deal

content: * INC shares rise 19 pct  biggest one-day pct jump ever (Adds comments from inVentiv CEO  analyst; updates shares)

title: UPDATE 3-INC Research to merge with inVentiv in latest contract medical research deal

content: * Inc research holdings inc - transaction estimated to realize approximately $100 million in annual run-rate cost synergies and projected to be accretive to adjusted eps
name: INC Research Holdings Inc
title: BRIEF-INC Research and inVentiv Health to merge

content: May 10 INC Research Holdings Inc  which provides medical firms with clinical research services  said on Wednesday it would buy privately held inVentiv Health Inc in a deal valued at about $4.6 billion.
name: INC Research Holdings Inc
title: Contract medical research firm INC to buy inVentiv in $4.6 bln deal
